tool_description: This API allows users to send text messages and images from the app to phone numbers.
title: AI Messaging

api_list.name: Send-Image
api_list.description: This endpoint allows users to send images
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-messaging.p.rapidapi.com/send-image"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-messaging.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
